form.label: Dashboard Processing Analysis, Processing of Raw Nmon data
form.description: This dashboard provides analysis of the nmon_processing sourcetype, which contains output of nmon raw data decoding steps done by nmon2csv converters

search.query: | pivot NMON_Processing_Data_Collect NMON_Processing sum(size_in_MB) AS sum_size_MB SPLITROW _time AS _time PERIOD day SORT 0 _time ROWSUMMARY 0 COLSUMMARY 0 NUMCOLS 0 SHOWOTHER 0
| pivot NMON_Processing_Data_Collect Errors_in_Processing count(Errors_in_Processing) AS error_count SPLITROW _time AS _time PERIOD day SORT 0 _time ROWSUMMARY 0 COLSUMMARY 0 NUMCOLS 0 SHOWOTHER 0
| pivot NMON_Processing_Data_Collect NMON_Processing sum(elapsed_in_seconds) AS sum_elapsed SPLITROW _time AS _time PERIOD day SORT 0 _time ROWSUMMARY 0 COLSUMMARY 0 NUMCOLS 0 SHOWOTHER 0

panel.title: Volume of Raw Data Proceeded (in MB)
